ygData.subject: Re: [archive-crawler] Log all Links

Hello Tom,

Your best bet is the warcs. The metadata entry for each fetched url has 
a complete list of discovered outlinks.

Noah

On 09/27/2011 12:50 AM, Tom Zeithaml wrote:
> Hello,
>
> On this page all log files are reported.
> https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Heritrix+Output
>
> But is there a log file, which reportet all extracted Links of a specific site ?
>
> f.e.
>
> Seed            Link
> www.domain.de   contact.html
> www.domain.de   page2.html
> www.domain.de   page3.html
> www.domain.de/contact   page3.html
> www.domain.de/contact   page2.html
> www.domain.de/contact   home.html
> ....
>
> best regards
> Tom
